name: Heart Attack! (BACONGUDEN)
description:
Made for a graduation project back in 2014 where the main goal was to mash together two popular games at the time into a simple playable. I chose Flappy Bird and Surgeon Simulator and made a high-score-based little playable game.

A very simple prototype made in Unity 4.5.5 back in 2014. Coded entirely in JavaScript (back before they called it UnityScript and it was horrible).

Don't ask me why I chose the fictional studio name "Redbox Games", I think I chose it on a whim because it was a requirement in the assignment.
